abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column recounts story of unidentified family in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, whose evacuated apartment was robbed while firefighters were battling flames in their building.
lead_paragraph: A family who fled its Brooklyn home because of smoke, returned to find $7,160 in property missing, including a bracelet and a silver Kiddush cup.

headline.main: A Family Suggests the First Responders to a Fire Were Thieves
headline.print_headline: Family Suggests First Responders to a Fire Were Thieves

snippet: A family who fled its Brooklyn home because of smoke, returned to find $7,160 in property missing, including a bracelet and a silver Kiddush cup.
